name: Megalo&Company
description: Founded on October 10th, 2010, Megalo&Company - a member of the Makheia Group - is the result of a merger between megalo (s), a digital marketing agency, created in 1998 and CRM Company Group, a relational marketing agency created in 2001. Megalo advises and accompanies brands in their strategic approach to the media and takes charge of all marketing and communication activities - from design to development and from implementation to analysis and customer support.
